title: Vegetarian Stir-Fry
description: A delightful mix of vegetables with a flavorful sauce.
steps: Chop your favorite vegetables (e.g., bell peppers, broccoli, and carrots).
Heat oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat.
Add garlic and ginger, stir for 30 seconds, then toss in the vegetables.
Stir-fry for 5-7 minutes until the veggies are tender-crisp.
Mix soy sauce, sesame oil, and a pinch of sugar in a bowl, then pour over the veggies.
Cook for another 2 minutes, serve hot with steamed rice or noodles.

title: Gluten-Free Pancakes
description: Fluffy pancakes made with almond flour.
steps: In a bowl, mix almond flour, baking powder, and salt.
In a separate bowl, whisk together eggs, almond milk, and vanilla extract.
Combine wet and dry ingredients until smooth.
Heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat and pour batter into small circles.
Cook until bubbles form on the surface, then flip and cook the other side.
Serve warm with your favorite toppings.

title: Quinoa Salad
description: A healthy and refreshing salad with quinoa and veggies.
steps: Rinse and cook quinoa according to package instructions.
Chop vegetables like cucumbers, tomatoes, and red onions.
In a large bowl, mix quinoa and vegetables.
Prepare a dressing with olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Drizzle the dressing over the salad and toss to combine.
Garnish with fresh herbs like parsley or cilantro and serve chilled.
